name: Agatha's Lair
description: Dome of woven branches in Neverwinter Wood. Home of banshee Agatha. Once beautiful elf now hateful spirit.
atmosphere: Dark, cold forest. Heavy vines and moss. Air grows colder. Unnatural stillness.
entrance: Screen of woven branches, low doorway
interior: Sparse furnishings: chests, shelves, table, reclined couch. All old elven craft.
agatha: Manifests as pale spectral elf with hateful expression
negotiation: DC 15 Persuasion (advantage if roleplayed well). Auto-succeed with Sister Garaele's silver comb gift.
answer: Will answer ONE question if treated respectfully
questions: Bowgentle's spellbook -> traded to Tsernoth of Iriaebor 100+ years ago
Hamun Kost's question (name of Old Owl Well wizard = Arthindol)
treasure: Silver comb gift from Sister Garaele (if used)
